attributes.action: Keep Drugs out of Prisons! How do they get in there to start with?
attributes.additional_details:
With staggering levels of drug addiction among prisoners:

- 40% of UK prisoners entering prison with a drugs problems;
- 80% leave prison addicted to drugs.

How is this be possible? or acceptable..., The time has come for the Nation to protest, get involved! How can you help? Could you make a difference?
ralph.findlay at blastfoundation.org.uk
